title: Hacked and stolen from
body:
Just yesteday i was hacked by believeing in those free rp scams we all know and love Z.z... however mine was a lot worse tho since even after taking only 2 min to change my password in that amount of time they purchased 200 dollars worth of rp That i dont have any money able to waste that much on... i need the money soon as its for my mother towards a family purchase and was just being held in my checking account... however its been a day and i was at least expecting someone to ask for more information,, i really need to either start the refund process or get the credientals to get the money back as i really need the money back soon.. i have yet to spend any RP in fear that if i spent some i wouldnt be able to refund the rp. Can a Rioter please let me know what is taking so long just to get some sort of answer that at least lets me know im getting closer to a response from a human or could even better help out with the process... this is very stressful it doesnt help that my mother needs the money soon as well.
With concern, 
                        A loyal league player

replies.body: I really despise the dishonest act of phishing, and I'm sorry that you had to go through it.  I looked into your case and see that you have quite a few tickets open on this, which can cause delays and confusion in responding to you- one is enough.  The body of the ticket is also not the most detailed, so you may be asked some verification questions once a specialist receives your case.  The queue is currently at a higher volume, so it will be a bit before you receive a response.  In the meantime, I recommend going over the [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to help secure your info in and outside of league.  Good luck!
